channel.title: AsperialX - The Legend 474
channel.description:
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/logo.gif[/img] [size=24pt][url=http://www.asperialx.com]www.asperialx.com[/url][/size]
[B]Why asperialX? that is a very good question. AsperialX has been a very experienced server, the name has been used for over 5 years and now we are back. We care about our players, and especially about our economy, for an example rune is not getable in shops people have to smith it and that creates an economy! We strive to create unique content and make the gameplay as fun as possible. We got 22 skills working and most of them are near perfect. It is currently vps hosted and we are spending alot of money into advertisment for a bigger player base. [/B]
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/adv.png[/img] Minigames [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/screen1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill6.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill7.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill9.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill10.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill11.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill12.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill13.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill14.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill15.png[/img]
Skills [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill8.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/screen7.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/screen8.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/screen9.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill3.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64609429/skill4.png[/img]
Quests
[SIZE=2][COLOR="#FFF0F5"]Cook's Assistant Sheep Shearer Dorics Quest Gertrudes Cat Knights Sword Vampyre Slayer Witchs Potion Rune Mysteries Imp Catcher Pirates Treasure[/COLOR][/SIZE] [/center]
